application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Ash - Remove 1no low southerly limb over car park & deadwood.T.2 Dead Elms x2 - Fell to ground level and remove all arisings		T.3 Ash (on bank) - Remove 1no lateral limb over garages		T.4 Ash (on lower lawn) - Crown reduction, reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 16m and spread 12m to height of adjacent Ash closer to buildingT.5 Holly Broom stems x4 and Hawthorn - Fell to ground level between arrows in red and poison stumps to mitigate water uptake. Treat stumps with herbicide to avoid regrowthT.6, T.7 and T.8 Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) x3 (by entrance of Kingston Hill) - Remove all stems over driveway and deadwood and crown lift parking area to fore of flats
